name: GitHub Pages should check the state of the system before interacting with the UI
title: GitHub Pages should check the state of the system before interacting with the UI

testSteps.description: Apisitt ensures all GitHub systems are operational

children.description: Apisitt sends a GET request to 'https://www.githubstatus.com/api/v2/status.json'

restQuery.requestHeaders:
Accept: application/json, text/plain, */*
